DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate how effective quetiapine versus placebo is when added to an existing therapy, in reducing the symptoms of PTSD.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Quetiapine as an Add on Therapy in the Treatment of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder
DOC.criteria: Hospitalised and nonhospitalised patients / Veteran or Civilian / Have had symptoms of PTSD for a minimum of 12 months prior to giving consent to the study History of psychotic condition / quetiapine or other antipsychotics not worked previously / Taking prohibited medications (mood stabilizers / substance abuse)
